XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes> <!--========================================= IMPORT ================================================--> <!-- GET ALL [GRID], Tournament Import --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/import/tournament/grid" Call="Dance.Web.JsonTournamentImport:WriteAllForGridToDevice"/>
<!-- GET ALL [GRID], Competition Import --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/import/competition/grid" Call="Dance.Web.JsonCompetitionImport:WriteAllForGridToDevice"/>
<!--========================================= TOURNAMENT ================================================--> <!-- SAVE Tournament --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/tournament" Call="Dance.Web.JsonTournament:Save"/>
<!-- DELETE Tournament --> <Route Method="DELETE" Url="/tournament/:id" Call="Dance.Web.JsonTournament:Delete"/>
<!--========================================= COMPETITION ===============================================--> <!-- SAVE Competition --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/tournament/:id/competition" Call="Dance.Web.JsonCompetition:Save"/>
<!-- SAVE ALL Competitions --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/tournament/:id/competition/all" Call="Dance.Web.JsonCompetition:SaveAll"/>
<!-- DELETE Competition --> <Route Method="DELETE" Url="/tournament/:id/competition/:id" Call="Dance.Web.JsonCompetition:Delete"/>
<Route Method="POST" Url="/competition/import" Call="Dance.Web.JsonCompetitionImport:WriteAllToDevice"/>
<Route Method="POST" Url="/competition/imported" Call="Dance.Web.JsonCompetitionImport:Update"/>
<Route Method="DELETE" Url="/competition/imported/:id/removeorrestore" Call="Dance.Web.JsonCompetitionImport:RemoveOrRestore"/>
<Route Method="POST" Url="/competition/createall" Call="Dance.Web.JsonCompetitionImport:CreateAll"/>
</Routes>
